data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Yukon, Canada.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yukon, Canada
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please send your Spirit to Yukon, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Yukon, Canada that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Yukon do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Jew, Eastern Yiddish-speaking people is yours.
Spirit, encourage every one of the 2,609 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
Spirit, fill the 2,609 believers in the state of Yukon with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Yukon a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

location.name: Yukon
location.people_groups_list: Jew, English-speaking, Malay, Han Chinese, Hakka, Kyrgyz, Japanese
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Jew, English-speaking (383,000), Malay (2,600), Han Chinese, Hakka (5,800), Kyrgyz (1,500), Japanese (57,000)
location.cities_list: Whitehorse, Watson Lake, Dawson City, Upper Liard, Haines Junction
location.cities_list_w_pop: Whitehorse (23,272), Watson Lake (1,547), Dawson City (1,375), Upper Liard (642), Haines Junction (613)
